mapper.insert:
/--不要批量的话去掉foreach就可以了--/ INSERT INTO newshapemodel (shapeUniqueId,createdAt,updatedAt,documentUniqueId,pageUniqueId,subPageName,appId,pageOriginWidth,pageOriginHeight, color,thickness,zorder,points,boundingRect,matrixValues,textStyle,text,shapeType,extraAttributes,groupId,layoutType, orientation,rotationPointXCoordinate,rotationPointYCoordinate) VALUES
(#{item.shapeUniqueId},#{item.createdAt},#{item.updatedAt},#{item.documentUniqueId},#{item.pageUniqueId},#{item.subPageName}, #{item.appId},#{item.pageOriginWidth},#{item.pageOriginHeight},#{item.color},#{item.thickness},#{item.zorder}, #{item.points,jdbcType=BLOB,typeHandler=com.onyx.note.handler.BlobTypeHandler},#{item.boundingRect},#{item.matrixValues}, #{item.textStyle},#{item.text},#{item.shapeType},#{item.extraAttributes},#{item.groupId},#{item.layoutType}, #{item.orientation},#{rotationPointXCoordinate},#{rotationPointYCoordinate})
mapper.update:
INSERT INTO newshapemodel (shapeUniqueId,createdAt,updatedAt,documentUniqueId,pageUniqueId,subPageName,appId,pageOriginWidth,pageOriginHeight, color,thickness,zorder,points,boundingRect,matrixValues,textStyle,text,shapeType,extraAttributes,groupId,layoutType, orientation,rotationPointXCoordinate,rotationPointYCoordinate) VALUES
(#{item.shapeUniqueId},#{item.createdAt},#{item.updatedAt},#{item.documentUniqueId},#{item.pageUniqueId},#{item.subPageName}, #{item.appId},#{item.pageOriginWidth},#{item.pageOriginHeight},#{item.color},#{item.thickness},#{item.zorder}, #{item.points,jdbcType=BLOB,typeHandler=com.onyx.note.handler.BlobTypeHandler},#{item.boundingRect},#{item.matrixValues}, #{item.textStyle},#{item.text},#{item.shapeType},#{item.extraAttributes},#{item.groupId},#{item.layoutType},#{item.orientation}, #{rotationPointXCoordinate},#{rotationPointYCoordinate})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE shapeUniqueId = values(shapeUniqueId),createdAt = values(createdAt), updatedAt = values(updatedAt),documentUniqueId = values(documentUniqueId), pageUniqueId = values(pageUniqueId),pageOriginWidth = values(pageOriginWidth), pageOriginHeight = values(pageOriginHeight),color = values(color), thickness = values(thickness),zorder = values(zorder), points = values(points),boundingRect = values(boundingRect), matrixValues = values(matrixValues),textStyle = values(textStyle), text = values(text),shapeType = values(shapeType), extraAttributes = values(extraAttributes),groupId = values(groupId), layoutType = values(layoutType),orientation = values(orientation), rotationPointXCoordinate = values(rotationPointXCoordinate),rotationPointYCoordinate = values(rotationPointYCoordinate)
